title: Kino no Tabi - The Beautiful World (Kino's Journey) complete
description:
This torrent has the whole series plus the 2 short movies and the OVA :-)


Perfectorizer Notes:

Original retail DVD videos had horizontal lines (emulating old CRT TV scan lines),
so in lower bit rates... those "scanlines" get ugly with no filters,
most torrent releases of this anime have problems with those "scanlines"...
so...

in "handbrake" I used the filters: Denoise=Strong, Deblock=5
and I got very good results!!! :-)


Credits: [kuchikirukia]
(For originally uploading these in 10bit Video & with subs)
